text: Podymalovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Dmitriyevsky Selsoviet, Ufimsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 1,601 as of 2010. There are 35 streets. == Geography == It is located 21 km from Ufa, 9 km from Dmitriyevka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ufimsky District
title: Podymalovo
